answerText: The Persians[10] The Persians is a play by this ancient Greek playwright of the Oresteia.
heading: SUBMIT |2014 | Harvard A, UVA B | 18 | Literature | Classical | College
subject: Literature
question: Question:  [10] Name this play in which Atossa awaits the return of her son from battle and summons her the ghost of her dead husband from the underworld, who condemns her son for his hubris in losing the Battle of Salamis.
